ploneCollection.title: The news collection
ploneCollection.description: Collection that shows all the news

text.react: [{"type":"p","props":{"children":["Collections are 'virtual folders' that contain content objects based on criteria. Those criteria can be"]}},{"type":"ul","props":{"children":[{"type":"li","props":{"children":["type of content"]}},{"type":"li","props":{"children":["subject, or tag"]}},{"type":"li","props":{"children":["a variety of time-based criteria"]}},{"type":"li","props":{"children":["based on certain text"]}},{"type":"li","props":{"children":["based on who created them"]}},{"type":"li","props":{"children":["and a whole range of other metadata"]}}]}},{"type":"p","props":{"children":["And, of course, you can combine all of them to narrow down your selection."]}},{"type":"p","props":{"children":["Richtext"]}},{"type":"p","props":{"children":["They also come with a richtext introduction, meaning the introduction can contain formatting, ",{"type":"a","props":{"href":"https://docs.plone.org/working-with-content/using-collections/newstyle/creating_collections.html","target":"_blank","rel":"noopener noreferrer","title":"Link to the Plone docs on creating collections","children":["links"]}}," and images"]}},{"type":"p","props":{"children":[{"type":"Img","props":{"src":"/examples/midsummer.jpg/","title":"How to lure people to Finland","alt":"A meme enticing people to come to Finland to sprint on Plone","className":"image-inline","children":[]}}]}}]
